Row.Text: Rare Specimen
Your farmers discovered a rare plant never before seen in a Plantation near the City. Your researchers are excited about studying it! Gain +{2_InstantYield}.
Hospital Overcrowding

Soldiers from the front pour into this City every day, and the wards are now filled with patients. Local doctors do not know what to do with the overflow and have petitioned your government for support. What will you do?
Send emergency funding.
For the next {5_Turns}, the City produces -5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Triage is the only option.
Implement a triage system, saving those that we can. The City loses 1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.
This is not our problem.
City produces -1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness permanently.
Set up a permanent stipend for the Hospital.
The City budget is adjusted by -10 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, but it gains +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness permanently.
Send all deceased to our Research Lab.
50% chance that the City will experience 3 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance. If so, the Hospital gains +4 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.
Cadavers were delivered to our Research Lab; however, the public is outraged at our callousness.
Hospital science experiments discovered!
Resort near Natural Wonder
As a result of the tourism generated by a nearby Natural Wonder, a business consortium decided to construct a Hotel in this City.
Ain't No Mountain High Enough
A climber is finally able to reach the peak of the highest Mountain in the region! Gain {2_InstantYield} and {3_CityYield} for {5_Turns}.
